page.title: 20A TYPICAL DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: After assembly we go out to play. I play hide and seek with my friends Cathy and Jeanette. When we go back to the classroom we do some written work. Sometimes we write a story and somtimes we do comprehension. At 12.00 it is dinner time, the people having school meals eat first, then the people having sandwiches eat theirs. I have sandwiches. In the afternoon we go to Elland Swimming Baths. a bus comes to collect us and take us to the baths. I have to do eight widths breast stroke and back stroke, then I practise floating. When we get back to school Mrs. Evans tells us a story. We go home at 3.40. When I get home I watch T.V. and at 5.20 I have my tea. Then I play out until bed time which is at 9.00.
